meanings.definition: Relating to speech sounds or the way they are pronounced.
meanings.sent1: The phonetic alphabet helps people learn how to say words correctly.
meanings.sent2: She used phonetic spelling to help her pronounce the new words.
meanings.sent3: The phonetic pronunciation of 'banana' made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His phonetic imitation of the teacher's accent was spot on.
meanings.sent5: The phonetic guide made it easy for him to learn the correct pronunciation.

meanings.sent1: The linguist studied the phonetic symbols used in different languages.
meanings.sent2: The phonetic transcription helped the students understand the pronunciation.
meanings.sent3: The phonetic chart looked like a secret code to the students.
meanings.sent4: The phonetic characters danced across the page, bringing the words to life.
meanings.sent5: The phonetic representation of the word made it easier to learn how to say it.
